rule.info: F5 Networks BigIP 事件
rule.description: F5 Networks BigIP events

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 虚拟服务器处于高需求流量事件期间或受到拒绝服务 (DoS) 攻击。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Virtual server is during high-demand traffic event or under Denial of Service (DoS) attack.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 平台进入软件 SYN cookie 保护模式。系统检测到 SYN 洪水攻击。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Platform entered software SYN cookie protection mode. The system has detected a SYN flood attack.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 停止限制可能由 DoS 攻击产生的流量。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Stopped throttling traffic likely generated by a DoS attack.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 已达到 SYN cookie 阈值。这可能是由于正常的流量峰值或攻击造成的。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: SYN cookie threshold is reached. This might be due to a normal spike in traffic or an attack.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 检测到 syncookie DOS 攻击。在 HSB 上激活了硬件 syncookie 保护模式。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Detected a syncookie DOS attack. Activated hardware syncookie protection mode on the HSB.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 正在进行的 DDos 攻击。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Ongoing DDos attack.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 在攻击期间由 AFM bdosd 守护程序创建/更新 (AFM) BDoS 动态签名。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Created/Updated (AFM) BDoS dynamic signature by the AFM bdosd daemon during an attack.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 已超出池成员每秒允许的新连接数。这是由于正常的流量峰值或攻击造成的。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Number of allowed new connections per second for pool member has been exceeded. This is due to a normal spike in traffic or an attack.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: Syncookie DOS 攻击已停止。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Syncookie DOS attack has stopped.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: Syncookie 计数器超出 vip 阈值。这是由于正常的流量峰值或攻击造成的。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Syncookie counter exceeded vip threshold. This is due to a normal spike in traffic or an attack.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: SYN cookie 状态已退出。平台恢复正常运行状态。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: SYN cookie state exited. The platform returns to a normal operation state.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: SSLv2 不再受支持，并且由于许多漏洞已被删除。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: SSLv2 is no longer supported and has been removed due to numerous vulnerabilities.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 用户被阻止做他们无权做的事情。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: User is prevented from doing things they are not authorized to do.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: Mcpd 检测到正在通过不正确的 VLAN 发送同步流量。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Mcpd has detected that sync traffic is being sent over a VLAN that is not the correct one.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 为当前配置建立了太多 SIP 媒体会话。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Too many SIP media sessions have been established for the current configuration.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: TMM 的严重错误。它重新启动。之后将尝试重新连接。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Critical error for TMM. It restarts. Attempts to reconnect will be made after that.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 错误可能是由损坏的功能或严重的系统错误引起的。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Errors could be caused by a broken feature or critical system errors.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: HAL 守护进程可能无法在启动时正确识别平台或发布硬件抽象配置，或者在正常运行期间遇到严重故障。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: The HAL daemon might not be able to correctly identify the platform or publish the hardware abstraction configuration at startup, or has encountered a critical failure during normal operation.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 硬件传感器严重警报。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Hardware sensor critical alarm.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: AOM 表示温度传感器已超过“临界”水平阈值。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: AOM has indicated that a temperature sensor has crossed a 'critical' level threshold.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: AOM 表示风扇传感器已超过“临界”阈值。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: AOM has indicated that a fan sensor has crossed a 'critical' threshold.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: AOM 表示功率传感器已超过“临界”阈值。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: AOM has indicated that a power sensor has crossed a 'critical' threshold.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 阻止 Broadcom 交换机在 BIG-IP 所需的正确配置下运行的严重错误。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Critical error that prevents the broadcom switch from operating at the proper configuration required by BIG-IP.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: TMM 线程之间的通信出现严重错误，特别是 MPI 代理。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Critical errors in communication between TMM threads, specifically by MPI proxy.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 阻止客人启动或关闭的严重问题。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Serious issue preventing the guest from starting or shutting down.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 关键：不允许 BIG-IP 系统不激活。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Critical: The BIG-IP system is not allowed not to go Active.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 关键：errdefsd 守护程序内存不足。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Critical: The errdefsd daemon is out of memory.

rule.info: F5 BigIP: 关键：未找到文件 /PLATFORM，许可逻辑无法确定平台类型。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Critical: The file /PLATFORM isn't found, and licensing logic cannot determine the platform type.

rule.info: F5 BigIP LTM：检测到机器人防御配置错误
rule.description: F5 BigIP LTM: Bot Defense configuration error detected

rule.info: F5 BigIP LTM：检测到 Tcpdump 消息
rule.description: F5 BigIP LTM: Tcpdump message detected

rule.info: F5 BigIP LTM：检测到 Tcpdump 远程会话开始
rule.description: F5 BigIP LTM: Tcpdump remote session start detected

rule.info: F5 BigIP ASM：在 $(bigip.asm.subsystem) 中检测到子系统错误
rule.description: F5 BigIP ASM: Subsystem error detected in $(bigip.asm.subsystem)

rule.info: F5 BigIP CEF 解码分组警报
rule.description: F5 BigIP CEF decoded grouped alerts

rule.info: F5 BigIP ASM：检测到违规，attack_type 为 $(cs4)
rule.description: F5 BigIP ASM: Violation detected, attack_type is $(cs4)

rule.info: F5 BigIP ASM：检测到非法 $(action)
rule.description: F5 BigIP ASM: Illegal $(action) detected

rule.info: F5 BigIP ASM：检测到 SQL 注入：$（code）
rule.description: F5 BigIP ASM: SQL injection detected: $(code)

rule.info: F5 BigIP ASM：检测到异常，attack_id 为 $(cn3)，status 为 $(cs4)
rule.description: F5 BigIP ASM: Anomaly detected, attack_id is $(cn3), status is $(cs4)

rule.info: F5 BigIP：检测到信息消息。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Info message detected.

rule.info: F5 BigIP：检测到通知消息。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Notice message detected.

rule.info: F5 BigIP：检测到警告消息。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Warning message detected.

rule.info: F5 BigIP：检测到警报消息。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Alert message detected.

rule.info: F5 BigIP：检测到关键消息。
rule.description: F5 BigIP: Critical message detected.
